title: What Rosie O'Donnell really said she wanted to do with her blood.
subtitle: Rosie O'Donnell's comedy is accused of saying, "I'd like to take my blood and stain it on the faces of Christians" -- but it's not exactly a quote.
author: David Emery
vclaim: In a radio interview, Rosie O'Donnell said, "I'd like to take my blood in the period and stain it all over the faces of Christians [or people who support life]."
